result.ga: Bhuail taom croí é
result.html: Bhuail taom croí éHe got a heart attack.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail taom croí éHe got a heart attack.

result.eng: A journey to the centre of the earth.
result.html: Turas go croí na cruinneA journey to the centre of the earth.
result.ponchtml: Turas go croí na cruinneA journey to the centre of the earth.

result.eng: She was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.
result.ga: Goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bocht
result.orig: Goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bocht
result.html: Goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bochtShe was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.
result.ponchtml: Goineaḋ go croí í ag féaċaint ar an duine boċtShe was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.

result.eng: 'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ga: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.orig: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.html: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag teaċt faoinár ndéin liúiġ duine de na fir óga agus ḃí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.

result.eng: It overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ga: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.orig: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.html: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé cuid ṁaiṫ de na faḋbanna seaċadta agus roċtana a ḃíoḋ ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.

result.eng: Not tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.
result.ga: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige
result.orig: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige
result.html: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aigeNot tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.
result.ponchtml: Ċan dólás croí aċ sólás croí a ḃí ar Ṡéimí nuair a ḃí a ḟaoiside déanta aigeNot tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.

result.eng: He would never do anything to hurt her.
result.ga: Ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croí
result.orig: Ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croí
result.html: Ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croíHe would never do anything to hurt her.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḋéanfaḋ sé a ḋaṫ ċoíċe a ġoinfeaḋ a croíHe would never do anything to hurt her.
